title: A Royal Adventure: The Chronicles of Chloe
description: Short story romance full of love, comedy, and humor, and replete with royalty and the romantic prince. Chloe Heffenpepper wants nothing more than to write a bestseller book but so far the universe hasn't cooperated. Instead, Chloe's babysitting dogs and doing odd jobs to make ends meet. That all changes the day she receives a phone call from a stranger inviting her to the annual Admiral's Ball. Chloe doesn't know it yet, but she's about to embark on a royal adventure and meet up with Prince Charming.   If you love fairy tales and still dream of happily ever after, this is the story for you. Fun, clean read; great for both teens and adults.  Shauna Forde invites you into her dream world of love and possibility, all combined with a sense of humor that will make you nod in agreement and turn page after page.
author: Shauna Forde
